headline: Did Broad Analyst Upgrades Amid Softer EPS Estimates Just Shift Prologis' (PLD) Investment Narrative?
summary: In recent days, Prologis attracted attention as analysts prepared for its latest quarterly update, with consensus pointing to earnings of US$1.44 per share and revenue of US$2.10 billion, while broker sentiment turned more positive. What stands out is that, even as earnings expectations edged slightly lower, a broad group of brokers maintained or upgraded positive ratings on the logistics REIT. We’ll now examine how this wave of analyst upgrades, alongside expectations for higher revenue,...
